> In a message dated 2/9/03 5:13:24 PM Central Standard Time,

> > The door closed behind Maxima, Hydras appeared seconds 
later "Now"Said

> >

> 
> Turning back around to face her host. her optics focusing upon him.
> 
> In the humanoid robot form with the hint of a white tiger Beast 
Machine. 
> 
> "I.. am Maxima. A Decepticon." She observed her host. "& you 
are...?" her 
> clear blue optics alert.
